string.name: movable_panel_text
string.description: String which appears in a movable TestPanel. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: stationary_panel_text
string.description: String which appears in a stationary TestPanel. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: system_move_switch_text
string.description: String indicating panel will be moved by system [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: scale_z_switch_text
string.description: String indicating panel will be scale in Z. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: anchorable_switch_text
string.description: String indicating panel will be anchorable. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: parent_switch_text
string.description: String indicating the if the panel is a child of a panel. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: plane_semantic
string.description: text label indicating plane semantic options. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: plane_type
string.description: text label indicating plane type options. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: any
string.description: Checkbox label for the Any plane semantic and type options. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: wall
string.description: Checkbox label for the Wall plane semantic option. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: floor
string.description: Checkbox label for the Floor plane semantic option. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: ceiling
string.description: Checkbox label for the Ceiling plane semantic option. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: table
string.description: Checkbox label for the Table plane semantic option. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: horizontal
string.description: Checkbox label for the Horizontal plane Type option. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: vertical
string.description: Checkbox label for the Vertical plane Type option. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]
